text: Alois Hitler (born Alois Schicklgruber, 7 June 1837 3 January 1903) was the father of Adolf Hitler. He was born in Waldviertel. His third marriage, from 1883 until his death, was to Adolf's mother, Klara who was also his niece. He was an Austrian customs official. == Personal life == He retired to a farm in 1895 and he was a beekeeper. He died of a stroke in Linz aged 65. In 1879 he changed his name from Alois Schicklgruber to Alois Hitler. == References == Category:1837 births Category:1903 deaths Category:Beekeepers Category:Civil servants Category:Hitler family Category:People from Lower Austria Category:Austrian Roman Catholics
